info.title: Introduction
info.description:
Welcome to Crypticorn API!

## SDKs

- [Python SDK](https://pypi.org/project/crypticorn/)
- [Node SDK](https://github.com/crypticorn-ai/api-client-typescript/pkgs/npm/api-client)

## Authentication

Get your API key from [Account Settings](https://app.crypticorn.com/account/settings) and include it in the `X-API-Key` header.

## Available APIs

The following APIs are available:
- [Hive AI API](/docs//?api=hive-ai-api)
- [Metrics API](/docs//?api=metrics-api)
- [Trading API](/docs//?api=trading-api)
- [Payment API](/docs//?api=payment-api)
- [Auth API](/docs//?api=auth-api)
- [DEX API](/docs//?api=dex-api)
- [Notification API](/docs//?api=notification-api)
- [Indicator API](/docs//?api=indicator-api)
- [Klines API](/docs//?api=klines-api)
